entries.text: Insufficient funds and required items in your possession.
This will restore default settings. Are you sure?
This will restore all default settings. Are you sure?
Sen in possession will exceed the maximum limit. Sen in excess of the maximum limit will be lost. Continue anyway?

This will save the game and return to the Title menu.
Are you sure?
Quit game and return to title menu?
Settings have been changed. Settings will be reverted in <?remainingSec?> seconds. Apply current settings?
Some settings will not be applied until you return to the Title Menu
This setting will be applied upon rebooting the game.
Settings have been changed. Settings will be reverted in <?remainingSec?> seconds Apply current settings?
Some settings will not be applied until you return to the Title Menu
Cannot Travel to a Sculptor's Idol you're currently communing with.
This Sculptor's Idol is unavailable until it is communed with again.
Items exceeding the maximum possession limit have been stored
Cannot purchase as you are at maximum storage and inventory limits
Unable to purchase as item is sold out
Items exceeding the maximum possession limit have been stored
Unable to exchange as doing so will exceed maximum possession and storage limits
Unable to exchange as item is sold out
Final tier information is now unlocked.
All prerequisites for this upgrade are not yet complete.
You haven't reached the required upgrade tier to see this information.
No compatible Prosthetic Tool in your possession.
The required skill has not yet been learned.
Prerequisites to view Skill information not yet met
This Skill information cannot be viewed until the prerequisite Skill(s) are acquired
The binding for this cannot be removed.
This will restore all default settings. Are you sure?
There are overlapping settings. Please confirm settings.
There are overlapping settings. Finish set up without saving settings?
Settings discarded as the primary device has been changed.

Delete current Remnant and start recording a new one?
Delete current Remnant and compose a new Remnant message?
When HDR is ON, Brightness can only be adjusted from the in-game Pause Menu.
Delete the selected profile and start a new game?
This will delete the selected profile. Are you sure?

Start playthrough #<?nextLoopCount?> now?
If you choose not to start playthrough #<?nextLoopCount?> now, you may do so by accessing the large Sculptor's Idol in the Dilapidated Temple at any time.
You will not be able to return to the current playthrough #<?loopCount?> upon starting playthrough #<?nextLoopCount?>. Are you sure you want to start playthrough #<?nextLoopCount?>?
